summary.para: A RedEyeCorrectionParams structure contains members that specify the areas of a bitmap to which a red-eye correction is applied.
You can can correct red eyes in a bitmap by following these steps.

item.description: Create and initialize a RedEyeCorrectionParams structure.
Pass the address of the RedEyeCorrectionParams structure to the method of a RedEyeCorrection object.
Pass the address of the RedEyeCorrection object to the Graphics.DrawImage method or to the method.

member.name: RedEyeCorrectionParams.numberOfAreas
member.summary: Integer that specifies the number of structures in the areas array.

member.name: RedEyeCorrectionParams.areas
member.summary: Pointer to an array of structures, each of which specifies an area of the bitmap to which red eye correction should be applied.
